title: Does Deadpool Hold Up in 2024?
description:
With Deadpool & Wolverine coming soon, we revisit Deadpool 1 to see if it still holds up. 

From this episode of In Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yxHXBua5HUM&pp=ygUJaW4gcmV2aWV3

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.
A Better Paradise is out now and available everywhere you get your podcasts."

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
